content: written in us crochet terms photos included for visual reference crochet skill level - easy written for women s sizes xs s m l & xl additional sizing adjustments and instructions for adding fringe included **materials ** crochet hook - size 4 5mm worsted weight cotton yarn recommended lily sugar n cream 100% cotton 120 yds/ 2 5 oz 1 ball for all sizes x-small 65 yds - 1 ball small 78 yds - 1 ball medium 92 yds - 1 ball large 102 yds - 1 ball x-large 117 yds - 1 ball
